attributes.action: Stop production of Petrol and Diesel cars by 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The enviroment is becoming a huge deal even in 2007/2008, with the polar ice caps melting, forest fires and extraordinary weather pattens.

A big problem with all would be car exhaust emissions, this petition is to ask the government and/or car manufactuers to stop production of petrol/diesel based cars and replace them with more enviromently cars.
